newsitem.title: JAPAN: Ogawa Sec to temporarily halt business -- sources.
newsitem.headline: Ogawa Sec to temporarily halt business -- sources.

text.p: Ogawa Securities Co Ltd, an affiliate of Yamaichi Securities Co Ltd, is expected report to the Ministry of Finance as early as Friday that it will temporarily suspend its operations, sources close to Ogawa said.
The sources, who asked not to be identified, said Ogawa would eventually decide to halt operations.
If that happens, it will be the first voluntary termination of business by a securities house under the licensing system for brokerages introduced in 1968, industry analysts said.
Osaka-based Ogawa has been ordered by the ministry to make management changes after it plunged into financial crisis.
Ogawa told Reuters on Friday that it had asked Yamaichi for financial support but it could not get positive replies from Yamaichi.
